div.p: HL7 V3: ActPriority* HL7 V3: ActPriority (2.16.840.1.113883.5.7) code system values.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActPriority
CodeDisplay
AASAPAs soon as possible, next highest priority after stat.
RroutineRoutine service, do at usual work hours.
SstatWith highest priority (e.g., emergency).
URurgentCalls for prompt action.
RRrush reportingA report should be prepared and sent as quickly as possible.
CRcallback resultsFiller should contact the placer as soon as results are available, even for preliminary results. (Was "C" in HL7 verion 2.3's reporting priority.)

description.value: HL7 V3: ActPriority* HL7 V3: ActPriority (2.16.840.1.113883.5.7) code system values.
